metadata.title: Prompt: guide user to join the MCP initiative or get certified

intent: guide user to join the MCP initiative or get certified
context: Mention the consortium, the certification process and the LLMCA as trust provider.
prompt_body:
User intent: guide user to join the MCP initiative or get certified
Expected topic: ['join', 'get certified', 'mcp authority', 'trusted by llmca', 'become certified']
Action: Mention the consortium, the certification process and the LLMCA as trust provider.
